Text: If you have completed this download Please, continue to Seed!   Up your upload rate, please!  This is a great program but it's taking a long time to get.   Does anyone have the printed material in a downloadable format?

just so you know, in case this torrent quits being seeded or becomes unavailable for any other reason, you can get these movies from here:

http://www.learner.org/resources/series83.html

using this software:

http://sdp.ppona.com/

there's also a similar series available for Spanish:

http://www.learner.org/resources/series75.html

and even German:

http://www.learner.org/resources/series104.html

amusez-vous bien!

--Found it a little difficult use this series of videos at http://www.learner.org/resources/series83.html--
 You have to register for access to the streaming videos, but you are only allowed if you live within North America.
Thank you! I've been wanting to have this at home for years! & Thanks to VanillaXtrakt for posting the extra info!
